content: The word "coquettish" is an adjective used to describe behavior or actions that are playful, flirtatious, and designed to attract attention or admiration. A person who is described as coquettish is someone who behaves in a way that is intended to be alluring or charming, often in a teasing or provocative manner. Coquettish behavior can be playful and innocent, or it can be more serious and seductive, depending on the context and the person's intentions.
